metadata.name: I AM KRUM!
metadata.description:
Meet Krum, the main protagonist of the Cosmic Safari graphic novel. Krum loves bubble blood ice cream, hanging out on rooftops in the city, and his favorite pastime- getting lost in comic books as a reprieve from a chaotic home life. In this piece, you see Krum as he heads to his favorite rooftop to enjoy his number one snackâ€¦ Little does Krum know his life is about to change forever when he is abducted from his home planet and whisked off to the COSMIC SAFARI! A safari planet where beings from across the universe are abducted and kept in a sort of intergalactic zoo! This is a chaotic tale of adventure, terror, friendship, family, good, evil, and life and death.

Each NFT in this series is a character from the Cosmic Safari graphic novel and every NFT is a part of the story in itself! With some NFTs that are an actual event in the book! In others, the event happening in your NFT might be alluded to in the story so you are essentially collecting a side quest.. A part of the story only you own. Your character might play a large role in the story, some will play a small role, and others might just be lurking around in the background. Every NFT will tie into the story and you will get to know your character no matter how large or small their role is in the story. 

I currently have 70 full color pages completed for the graphic novel! When you collect a Cosmic Safari NFT, you are providing me with the time to work toward finishing the last two chapters. All collectors who hold five different edition pieces and/or collectors who own a 1/1 will receive a signed copy of the hardcover book upon its release! (Not valid for secondary market once the books are released and have been mailed off) 

With each release, you will get to know the wild cast of characters and dive into the lore behind Cosmic Safari! Holders of Cosmic Safari NFTs can expect to be getting some pretty awesome COSMIC utilities in the future to be announced in the Discord/Twitter!
